game.name: Fields of Fortune
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Relax and build the farm of your dreams or automate everything for maximum efficiency. Fields of Fortune combines cozy farming, animal care, and exploration with deep automation systems for players who love to optimize.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Relax and build the farm of your dreams or automate everything for maximum efficiency. Fields of Fortune combines cozy farming, animal care, and exploration with deep automation systems for players who love to optimize.
